mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_SISZ2_HI5Y( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, INFO_DATE, UNIT_NAME, UNIT_TYPE, INSURANCE_TYPE, START_DATE, END_DATE, INSURANCE_STATE, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{infoDate}, #{unitName}, #{unitType}, #{insuranceType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{insuranceState}, #{appId} )
